tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was suffering from an intermittent incontinence problem for over 2 years  and consulted several doctors without relief. After reading about the medical speciality of Uro-Gynaecology, I consulted Uro-Gynaecologist Dr. Niraj Mahajan. It was indeed a lucky choice! 
       Dr. Mahajan gave me sound medical advice and I finally gained relief. Throughout my interaction with him, he was sensitive, friendly and prompt, always encouraging me to contact him for any query. So positive was my experience that Dr. Mahajan will be my first choice for any uro-gynaec problem hereafter and I can warmly recommend him to friends.

Dr.Mahajan is Very helffull and coopretive nature of my twin child who mentally and physically challenged,a lot of thanx and god bless u.
Very easily and no any problem facing about abdominal hysterectomy.

review: I met lot of doctors in this 3 yrs for my problem he is not like other doctors he is a very good doctor must say I had a very nice experience with the treatment

PLEASE DO NOT GO TO HIM. I walked into the room for a checkup, and he took one look at the dry skin around my lips and told me that I have Herpes. Here’s a little background - I’ve had eczema since I was 5 and the rashes on my fingers and elbows ******* *** **** **** ** ***** **** ****** ******* ** *** **** *** ****** **** ***** *** he INSISTED I have Herpes and was so confident that he was right. ** ****** **** ** * ****** ***** ** ** ** *********  Nonetheless, I took multiple tests and the results were all negative just as I expected. 
It’s extremely unprofessional ** ****** * ******* *** ****** ******* * ********** **** ****** *** ***** ** **** ***** *** **** ****** ******* *** ******

1 . Am very happy with Dr. Because  I was very disturbed  last  4 moth
2.  I tried  to other hospital  and Dr  but no one given this type of treatment

Dr Niraj sir is very intelligent person,helpful in nature ,soft talking ,understanding, respectful person .from my pregnancy to delivery & till now for any small to big problem he solved nicely .my delivery date was overdue & there was 99% chances of ceaserion but because of sir I delivered normally without any complications  .I m very  thankful of Dr NIRAJ SIR *** *******  ** **** ****  ********* *
